channel.title: Sending a string from server to client
channel.description:
I want to send for example public String xpAmount (wich i already gave the correct input) to my client, so that it shows the input i made in the server in the client. I've tried adding readString(xpAmount) in client side player.java and adding writeString(xpAmount) in updateplayerappearance in server. but that way it only wrote the input of the players around my character. but i want it to send only the input of my own character. so some1 help me please?
Oh and btw dont say sendQuest, cuz thats not what i mean.
EDIT nevermind i got it working

item.title: Sending a string from server to client
